Articles.Content:
I peacefully end the hill war

nobody's hill, its a demilitarized zone

UN peacekeepers arrive to the hill to protect its status.

UN's nobody's demilitarized hill.

Uncaring military power takes over the hill.

Uncaring military hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-06-22T18:44:10Z" title="06/22/2017 06:44  PM" data-short="7 yr">June 22, 2017</time> by 53miner53**
  
Typo

I destroy your military with fleet of IKS spaceships.

IKS's hill.

I destroy IKS spaceships with orbital bombardment platforms launched by my many space shuttles, which land at the hill, heavily armed.

My hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-06-26T02:34:49Z" title="06/26/2017 02:34  AM" data-short="7 yr">June 26, 2017</time> by Spacetraindriver**

I violate your trademark, and build a lead hill in the crater containing a bunker and lasers.

My hill
Crater cracks. Cratercracker appears. His hill.

as god of this thread, i smite down your hill and raise a mountain

my mountain
Your HILL (until i nuke it)

Enormous volcanic eruption blows up the sacred mountain and leaves a ridge of hills as its remains.

Some of them say it was caused by a nuke. Others believe that was anger of a local deity.  

Anyways, everybody can now choose a hill.
I pick TAPE's hill.

I feed tape to the penguins ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") 

i then give the hill to tom Scott who immediately gives it back i then give it to A person he nukes it 

Persons hill

>

> So, the thread can be closed?

No but the hill can be locked to make a nature preserve.

My radioactive nature preserve.
Gamma-ray fireflies' hill.
My hill with gamma-ray fireflies with 2 kilograms of lead in their heads.

I spray bugspray all over the hill.

My hill covered in dying fireflies.
Now it is a hill covered with radioactive mess.
